// Return the heliocentric ecliptical position (Vsop87)
Vec3d Planet::getHeliocentricEclipticPos() const
{
Vec3d pos = eclipticPos;
PlanetP pp = parent;
if (pp)
{
while (pp->parent)
{
pos += pp->eclipticPos;
pp = pp->parent;
}
}
return pos;
}
